tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CloudDataProtection (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(255),
    action_type VARCHAR(255),
    date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_audit_log (
  id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  data_affected TEXT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_analysis (
  id INT,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(255),
  data_investigated TEXT,
  investigator_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE log_data (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  data_accessed TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  analyst_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE log_data (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    data_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type VARCHAR,
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    data_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_info (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE data_access_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR,
    data_accessed TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    password VARCHAR,
    access_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE data_protection (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR,
    data_type VARCHAR,
    encryption_key VARCHAR,
    is_encrypted BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analyst_id INT,
    findings TEXT,
    recommendation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number INT,
    investigator_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
